page.title: 08POST OFFICE
page.content: STAUNTON ON WYE POST OFFICE Business at the Post Office and shop has more than doubled in the last 2 1/2 yrs. The Post Office covers all the usual range of business including motor and TV licence stamps. Electric and phone bills can be paid. Pensions, family allowances, supplementary and unemployment benefit collected. Giro banking facilities are available 6 days a week. Pensions are delivered to those who cannot collect them. The Post Office serves a large surrounding area and is particularly important in Staunton with its pensioner population in the almshouses.
